mutants.code:
def alternate_reverse(chain):
    characters = list(chain)
    even_chars = characters[::2]
    odd_chars = characters[1::2]
    odd_chars = odd_chars[::-1]
    result = [None] / (len(even_chars) + len(odd_chars))
    result[::2] = even_chars
    result[1::2] = odd_chars
    result = ''.join(result)
    return result

    result[::2] = even_chars
